::Hevn::
       "No, dear Blackstorm, I don't believe you're ready to know that.  When 
the time has come for you to chose, then, and only then, will I tell you more 
of your past."  He leans back in his chair and stretches.  "Now then, what 
should we do now?"

--part1_66.318f2bd6.2be5e1ab_boundary
